column4: I have a laptop with a headphone socket, however, when I put in headphones (or external speakers) the sound cuts out entirely and there is no sound through the headphones. Removing the headphones restores sound. How can I fix this?
Check that headphone device is not muted in alsamixer
When I run Alsamixer, I have Master, PCM and Front at full volume and Mic and Mic Boost at 0. I have no microphone connected.
Yes, volume may be high, but is there an M letter in the bottom part of the volume bar designating muting? You should probably have kind of "Line Out" device.
